name: react-native-firebase-legacy
deprecated: This package has been deprecated. Please migrate to the new enhanced Expo version in the root directory.

scripts.start: echo '⚠️  DEPRECATED: This legacy app is deprecated. Use the new enhanced version in the root directory.' && echo 'Run: cd .. && npm start' && exit 1
scripts.android: echo '⚠️  DEPRECATED: This legacy app is deprecated. Use: cd .. && npm run android' && exit 1
scripts.ios: echo '⚠️  DEPRECATED: This legacy app is deprecated. Use: cd .. && npm run ios' && exit 1
scripts.web: echo '⚠️  DEPRECATED: This legacy app is deprecated. Use: cd .. && npm run web' && exit 1
scripts.postinstall:
echo '
⚠️  DEPRECATION WARNING ⚠️' && echo 'This legacy app is deprecated and will reach end-of-life on Jan 1, 2026.' && echo 'Please migrate to the new enhanced version in the root directory.' && echo 'Migration guide: ../MIGRATION.md
'
